ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Ports to Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I understand the  ports to luclin  became available on the live servers  just recently like within the last week. as for Twilight Sea I ve no idea
ygData.messageBody:
From what I understand the ports to luclin became available on the live
servers just recently like within the last week.

as for Twilight Sea I've no idea you could always bind your self near the
portal spot or zoneline and explore and see what happens

Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 32 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 7 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn Server
DoF Email list: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/DoFGuild/

----- Original Message -----
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>


> So, how long have we druids had the ports to Luclin? I just heard
> about it, learned that the spells were in my home of Rivervale, and
> bought all I could use. Just wondered if this was very new, or if I
> simply have had my head up my backside. Hadn't seen the vendor
> before. In the back of the druid's guild in Rivervale.
>
> Anyone familiar with the Twilight Sea? Since I can port right there,
> to the island of the elementals, I was wondering if it would be nuts
> to try to solo there at lvl 33? Nice drops from those elementals, but
> I may try to get a group up if the solo thing is not workable.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
